name: The Villain's Lair
description:
In this game you play as evil mage, trying to defend himself from heroes attacking his lair. All villains are destined to be defeated sooner or later, so in this game you just try to survive the longest and get the highest score.

Made for Bored Pixels Jam 8.

Instructions: 

Game has some RPG elements, being that you can spend your score to upgrade stats. Heroes might also drop scrolls, witch will allow you to cast 4 spells:

Heal Wounds - restores all your hp, 

Forcefield - prevents from taking damage for a short time,

Magic Missile - throws a small orb witch travels in direction of your movement and deals damage dependent no your magic stat,

Death's Touch - has a chance to kill all heroes visible on the screen.

w,a,s,d - movement

arrow keys - attacking

1,2,3,4 - casting spells

q - upgrade force

e - upgrade vitality

r - upgrade magic

f - upgrade speed
